knimeNode.name: Table To DL4J Vector (Regression)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the table to DL4J input for regression.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts a table to a number vector used by the Deeplearning4J Integration. This node is only used for testing purposes in order to validate the conversion. The node tries to convert every input column contained in the table. Possible target columns can be specified in the node dialog which will be converted into a separate vector.
fullDescription.option: Specify the columns used as targets for regression. These will be converted in a separate vector.
